Class ColorSimParameter

java.lang.Object
  sim.Parameter
      sim.ColorParameter
          sim.ColorSimParameter

public class ColorSimParameter
extends ColorParameter

ColorSimParameter is a wrapper class for ColorParameter, to be used as a simulation parameter.

Version:
1 (03/11/2010)

Constructor Detail

ColorSimParameter

public ColorSimParameter(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String[] possibleCols,
                         boolean isAdjustable)
Creates a ColorSimParameter given a name for the parameter, a String array of possible color names and a boolean value to indicate whether or not the parameter is adjustable during running of the simulation.

Parameters:
name - the name.
possibleCols - a String array of color names (corresponding exactly to the names of the static Colors held by the java.awt.Color class, e.g. Color.blue, Color.lightGray). The array can hold any number of color names. This ColorSimParameter's color will then be adjustable within this defined set of possible colors. If the ColorSimParameter is not to be adjustable, then the possibleCols array should contain just the one name of the color to be used.
isAdjustable - true or false.
